body_html: This code snippet in __init__ would change neither the behavior of the layer nor its docstring and signature. For the time being I would simply mention the default initializer in the docstring.
body_text: This code snippet in __init__ would change neither the behavior of the layer nor its docstring and signature.  For the time being I would simply mention the default initializer in the docstring.
body: This code snippet in `__init__` would change neither the behavior of the layer nor its docstring and signature.  For the time being I would simply mention the default initializer in the docstring.
